LanguageData.WAW.OrderAttack.Desc: Order warband to attack hostile settlemnt, or another warband, or other world objects.
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandWithdraw.Desc: Return all loots with drop pods
LanguageData.WAW.ConfirmDestroyWarBand: Are you sure you want to remove this warband?
LanguageData.WAW.Configure.Desc: re-arrange and recruit more troops for this warband
LanguageData.WAW.Surrounded.Desc: This warband is surrounded by hostile forces, they are unable to retreat, however you can still make them exit from map edge.
LanguageData.WAW.PlaceLootBox.Desc: place a loot box on disired location
LanguageData.WAW.ResettleWarband.Desc: Move warband On another tile, it will cost $10 per tile and person.
LanguageData.WAW.CreateWarband.Desc: Create a warband here on the tile, select one of your colonists as its leader.
LanguageData.WAW.Interact.Desc: Interact with other worldobjects through warband leader.
LanguageData.WAW.PromoteSoldier.Desc: "Promote" {0} to be one of your colonists.
LanguageData.WAW.RecycleVehicle.Desc: A bridge combat team clears all its vehicles everytime it raids, this command stores a vechile back to warband.
LanguageData.WAW.AutoLoad.Desc: Load everything 10 cells near loot chest.
LanguageData.WAW.SpawnVassalCommand.Desc: Spawn a temporary warband that can be deployed only once using this vassal faction's budget.
LanguageData.WAW.ManageLoadoutDesc: Decide artillery shells and spawn-with resources.
